items.content_html: Ngx-Bottom-Sheet is a highly customizable and lightweight Angular service that provides a mobile-friendly bottom sheet component. Originally designed for Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and mobile-first applications, this component can be used seamlessly in desktop environments as well.

items.content_html: A lightweight weather application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Stay updated on current weather conditions worldwide. Includes a user-friendly interface, location search, and real-time weather data integration using a weather API.
